title: Truly Truly Outrageous

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I'm playing nothing but Armour of the 5th Age Taric on Poro King, until someone bans it on me.

replies.body: Armour of the 5th Age Taric best taric

I finally saw an enemy Taric! on my 114th game. Unfortunately it was a support team troll. So people still not banning it from me.
83 wins 31 Losses . 2.67 Win Ratio.
Yesterday I was matched against a Challenger 1 opponent. and its not uncommon to get Diamonds and Plats. So it's definitely getting harder. Almost  every game is a challenge. So many games have ended with only the nexus on both sides.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA/31852882?champion=44&map=12
i can see his point and click stun being usefull for securing PKs. And with your team constantly near you the auras would defo help. I may play a bit of him to sus it out.
im failing to see how taric has any advantages in PK... except for longer  duration stuns after u get in melee range... is it to do with his sustain? or the fact hes a counter to Talon lol
I think it's a combination of auras, and that stun. Early game if you get stunned you will cop 5 poros to the face. Late game, lock down the enemy carry.
